key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including potential civil money penalties and operational restrictions
Economic sensitivity to interest rate fluctuations and regional economic downturns
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech disruptors
Merger integration risks with CrossFirst Bankshares
Cybersecurity threats, including data breaches and system failures
controversies: Concerns raised by Fair Finance Watch about disparities in mortgage lending to African Americans compared to whites
Ongoing consumer litigation impacting financial performance and customer trust
social_issues: Community development and sustainable banking practices under ESG initiatives
governance_issues: Challenges in achieving projected synergies from the merger with CrossFirst Bankshares
